apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: my-namespace
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/my-namespace:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: my-namespace
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---

Generation completed successfully.

apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: my-namespace
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---

    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""

##### FILE: myapp12.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/init-demo:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: init-demo
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    name: nginx
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 250m
        memory: 256Mi
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 128Mi
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
      name: workdir
  initContainers:
  - command:
    - wget
    - -O
    - /work-dir/index.html
    - http://info.cern.ch
    image: busybox
    name: install
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /work-dir
      name: workdir
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: workdir

---

##### FILE: myapp2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/ease:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: ease
    tier: web
  name: ease
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ease
      tier: web
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ease
        tier: web
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: ease-config
        image: oceanstime/centosphp72
        name: web
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 600Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/html/
          name: web-persistent-storage
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        - (cd /var/www/html/ && composer install --no-dev && composer require predis/predis)
          && (php artisan config:clear || true) && (php artisan route:clear || true)
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: ease-config
        image: oceanstime/centosphp72
        name: artisan
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: var/www/html/
          name: web-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: web-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: ease-pvc

---

##### FILE: myapp26.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/init-demo:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: init-demo
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    name: nginx
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 250m
        memory: 256Mi
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 128Mi
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
      name: workdir
  initContainers:
  - command:
    - wget
    - -O
    - /work-dir/index.html
    - http://info.cern.ch
    image: busybox
    name: install
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /work-dir
      name: workdir
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: workdir

---

##### FILE: myapp4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/init-demo:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: init-demo
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    name: nginx
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 250m
        memory: 256Mi
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 128Mi
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
      name: workdir
  initContainers:
  - command:
    - wget
    - -O
    - /work-dir/index.html
    - http://info.cern.ch
    image: busybox
    name: install
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /work-dir
      name: workdir
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: workdir

---

apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: myapp-autoscaling
  namespace: default
spec:
  maxReplicas: 4
  metrics:
  - resource:
      name: cpu
      target:
        averageUtilization: 70
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  - resource:
      name: memory
      target:
        averageUtilization: 80
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  minReplicas: 2
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: myapp-control

        image: my-app-image
        name: my-app

        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/kpf/enable-config
          name: config-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: Cleverbit__Enabled
            path: enable
          name: app-config
        name: config-volume

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to macedonsky777/Ingress/myflaskpyapp-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: letsencrypt-prod
    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: nginx
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-redirect: "false"
  name: myflaskpyapp-ingress
  namespace: macedonsky777
spec:
  rules:
  - host: app.macedonsky777-cluster.watashinoheyadesu.pp.ua
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: myflaskpyapp-service
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - app.macedonsky777-cluster.watashinoheyadesu.pp.ua
    secretName: myflaskpyapp-tls

---

##### FILE: myapp-init-pod.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/myapp-pod:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  labels:
    app: myapp
  name: myapp-pod
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - echo The app is running! && sleep 3600
    image: busybox:1.28
    name: myapp-container
  initContainers:
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - until nslookup myservice.$(cat /var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/namespace).svc.cluster.local;
      do echo waiting for myservice; sleep 2; done
    image: busybox:1.28
    name: init-myservice

---

##### FILE: myapp-primary.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/myapp-primary:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: myapp
    type: front-end
  name: myapp-primary
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: front-end
        version: v1
      name: myapp-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: myapp-image:1.0
        name: app-container

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/myapp-primary

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/myapp-primary
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/myapp-primary failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

    app: kafkaclient
  name: myclient
  namespace: default

    matchLabels:
      name: kafkaclient
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: kafkaclient
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -f
        - /dev/null
        command:
        - tail
        image: bitnami/kafka:${VERSION}
        name: kafkaclient
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 0

          containers:
          - command:
            - /bin/sh
            - -c
            - date; echo Hello from the Kubernetes cluster
            image: busybox:1.28
            imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
            name: hello
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
  schedule: 1 * * * *

##### FILE: mydata.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/mydata-pod:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: mydata-pod
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - env:
    - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
      value: password
    image: mysql:8.0
    name: mydata-container
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
      name: host-path
  nodeSelector:
    kubernetes.io/hostname: k8s-node1
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /DATA1/mysql-data
      type: DirectoryOrCreate
    name: host-path

---

##### FILE: mydata-v1_2.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mydata-v1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mydata
    version: v1
  name: mydata-v1
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mydata
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mydata
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: index-html
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mydata-cm-v1
        name: index-html

---

##### FILE: mydb_secret.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/db1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: db1
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      dish: samosa
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        dish: samosa
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_DATABASE
              name: sqlsecret
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: sqlsecret
        image: mysql
        name: dbb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306

---

  - env:

      valueFrom:
        secretKeyRef:

    image: mariadb
    name: newdb
    volumeMounts:

      name: ourdb

  - name: ourdb
    persistentVolumeClaim:
      claimName: claim-pvc

    kubernetes.io/change-cause: deploy/mydeploy is set as mycontainer=clarusway/clarusweb:1.0
  labels:
    app: myapp
  name: mydeploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: myapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: clarusway/clarusweb:1.0
        name: mycontainer
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: lovelearnlinux/webserver:v1
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 70m
            memory: 70Mi

##### FILE: mydeploymentmaxsurge.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/myapp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    type: webapp
  name: myapp
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      type: webapp
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 2
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        type: webapp
      name: myapp-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: mywebapp

---

metadata:
  labels:
    type: webapp
  name: myapp
  namespace: default

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/myapp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    type: webapp
  name: myapp
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 30
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      type: webapp
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 2
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        type: webapp
      name: myapp-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: mywebapp

##### FILE: mydiary-back-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mydiary-back:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert
    kompose.version: 1.28.0 (c4137012e)
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: mydiary-back
  name: mydiary-back
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: mydiary-back
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert
        kompose.version: 1.28.0 (c4137012e)
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/3tier-rolling-be-db: "true"
        io.kompose.network/3tier-rolling-fe-be: "true"
        io.kompose.service: mydiary-back
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SPRING_DATASOURCE_PASSWORD
          value: user
        - name: SPRING_DATASOURCE_URL
          value: jdbc:mysql://mydiary-db:3306/paperdb?serverTimezone=Asia/Seoul
        - name: SPRING_DATASOURCE_USERNAME
          value: user
        image: dbgurum/mydiary-back:1.0
        name: rolling-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources: {}
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/hostname: k8s-node2
      restartPolicy: Always
status: {}

---

##### FILE: mydiary-db-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mydiary-db:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert
    kompose.version: 1.28.0 (c4137012e)
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: mydiary-db
  name: mydiary-db
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: mydiary-db
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert
        kompose.version: 1.28.0 (c4137012e)
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/3tier-rolling-be-db: "true"
        io.kompose.service: mydiary-db
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --character-set-server=utf8
        - --collation-server=utf8_general_ci
        env:
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: paperdb
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          value: user
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_HOST
          value: '%!'(MISSING)
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: pass123
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: user
        image: mysql:5.7-debian
        name: rolling-db
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        resources: {}
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/hostname: k8s-node3
      restartPolicy: Always
status: {}

---

kind: Deployment

    kompose.cmd: kompose convert
    kompose.version: 1.31.2 (a92241f79)
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: mydiary-front
  name: mydiary-front
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: mydiary-front
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert
        kompose.version: 1.31.2 (a92241f79)
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/kompose-rolling-fe-be: "true"
        io.kompose.service: mydiary-front
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: dbgurum/mydiary-front:1.0
        name: rolling-front
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          hostPort: 3000
          protocol: TCP
        resources: {}
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/hostname: k8s-node1
      restartPolicy: Always
status: {}

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/myenergi:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: myenergi
  name: myenergi
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myenergi
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: myenergi
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: USERNAME
          value: <MYENERGI_USERNAME>
        - name: APIKEY
          value: <MYENERGI_API_KEY>
        - name: SERVER
          value: https://s18.myenergi.net
        - name: PORT
          value: "8000"
        - name: ENABLE_EDDI
          value: "True"
        - name: ENABLE_HARVI
          value: "True"
        - name: ENABLE_ZAPPI
          value: "False"
        - name: ENABLE_LIBBI
          value: "False"
        image: <DOCKER_IMAGE_NAME>
        name: myenergi
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000

---

kind: Pod

  name: my-first-configmap-env
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - sleep
    - "3600"
    env:
    - name: PLAYER_INITIAL_LIVES
      valueFrom:
        configMapKeyRef:
          key: player_initial_lives
          name: my-first-configmap
    - name: UI_PROPERTIES_FILE_NAME
      valueFrom:
        configMapKeyRef:
          key: ui_properties_file_name
          name: my-first-configmap
    - name: SECRET_NAME
      valueFrom:
        secretKeyRef:
          key: username
          name: my-first-secret
    - name: SECRET_PASSWORD
      valueFrom:
        secretKeyRef:
          key: password
          name: my-first-secret
    image: alpine
    name: my-first-container

---

  name: my-first-volume
  namespace: default

  containers:
  - command:
    - sleep
    - "3600"
    image: alpine
    name: my-first-volume
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /etc/config/configMap
      name: my-first-volume-map
    - mountPath: /etc/config/secret
      name: my-first-secret
  volumes:
  - configMap:
      name: my-first-volume
    name: my-first-volume-map
  - name: my-first-volume-secret
    secret:
      secretName: my-first-volume-secret

---

##### FILE: myflower-dep_1.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/website-backend-flower:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: myflower
  name: website-backend-flower
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myflower
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: myflower
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - bash
        - -c
        - celery -A worker.app flower --port=5001
        - sleep 60m
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: backend-secret
        image: ilia999x/backend-backend:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: myflower
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5001
          name: myflower
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: dockerregkey

---

apiVersion: v1
data:
  handler.lua: "local MyHeader = {}\r\n\r\n MyHeader.PRIORITY = 1000\r\n MyHeader.VERSION
    = \"1.0.0\"\r\n\r\n function MyHeader:header_filter(conf)\r\n   -- do custom logic
    here\r\n   kong.response.set_header(\"myheader\", conf.header_value)\r\n end\r\n\r\n
    return MyHeader"
  schema.lua: "return {\r\n   name = \"myheader\",\r\n   fields = {\r\n     { config
    = {\r\n         type = \"record\",\r\n         fields = {\r\n           { header_value
    = { type = \"string\", default = \"roar\", }, },\r\n         },\r\n     }, },\r\n
    \  }\r\n }"
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  name: myheader
  namespace: kong

##### FILE: my-ingress4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/my-ingress-vcicd:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: nginx
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/use-regex: "true"
  name: my-ingress-vcicd
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: localhost
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: client-srv
            port:
              number: 3000
        path: /?(.*)
        pathType: ImplementationSpecific
      - backend:
          service:
            name: posts-clusterip-srv
            port:
              number: 4000
        path: /posts/create
        pathType: Prefix
      - backend:
          service:
            name: query-srv
            port:
              number: 4002
        path: /posts
        pathType: Prefix
      - backend:
          service:
            name: comments-srv
            port:
              number: 4001
        path: /posts/?(.*)/comments
        pathType: ImplementationSpecific

---

        - bin/sh
        - -c
        - 'for i in 1 2 3 4 5 6; do echo Seu nmero da sorte : $i = $((1 + RANDOM
          %!)(MISSING)); done'
        image: busybox
        name: my-container-busybox
      restartPolicy: Never

---

##### FILE: my-liveness-probe.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/myapp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    type: webapp
  name: myapp
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      type: webapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        type: webapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 3
          timeoutSeconds: 4
        name: app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy

  name: mysql-policy
  namespace: default

  ingress:
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: wordpress

    - port: 3306
      protocol: TCP

##### FILE: mynewjob.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/mynewjob:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  name: mynewjob
  namespace: default
spec:
  completions: 3
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sleep
        - "5"
        image: busybox
        name: mynewjob
        resources: {}
      restartPolicy: Never
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 60
status: {}

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Job/mynewjob

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Job/mynewjob
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Job/mynewjob failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Job/mynewjob failed:
1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

##### FILE: my-nginx-ingress1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/my-nginx:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /
  name: my-nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: k8s.site
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: my-nginx
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
      - backend:
          service:
            name: hello
            port:
              number: 3000
        path: /dat
        pathType: Prefix

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 1, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/my-ns:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: my-ns
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/my-ns:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: my-ns
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---

Generation completed successfully.

kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: my-ns
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/dj-bohconvert-test:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  labels:
    app: dj-bohconvert
  name: dj-bohconvert-test
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - env:
    - name: SECRET_KEY
      value: cc90682b9f1e12d7a9d23c63d0b4e9e01dbcd55ba9ddda2b
    - name: DEBUG
      value: "1"
    - name: ALLOWED_HOSTS
      value: 127.0.0.1,localhost
    - name: DB_ENGINE
      value: django.db.backends.postgresql
    - name: POSTGRES_DB
      value: bohconvert_db
    - name: POSTGRES_USER
      value: bohconvert_db_user
    - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
      value: bohconvert_db_password
    - name: POSTGRES_HOST
      value: 127.0.0.1
    - name: POSTGRES_PORT
      value: "5432"
    image: alexandre11aa/bohc:latest
    name: dj-bohconvert
    ports:
    - containerPort: 8000
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
      name: data
  - env:
    - name: POSTGRES_DB
      value: bohconvert_db
    - name: POSTGRES_USER
      value: bohconvert_db_user
    - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
      value: bohconvert_db_password
    image: postgres:13-alpine
    name: psql
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
      name: data
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: data

---

##### FILE: mypv.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/PersistentVolume/mypv-demo:
apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolume
metadata:
  name: mypv-demo
  namespace: default
spec:
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteOnce
  capacity:
    storage: 1Gi
  hostPath:
    path: /mnt/data
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Retain

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/PersistentVolume/mysql-pv:
apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolume
metadata:
  name: mysql-pv
  namespace: default
spec:
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteOnce
  capacity:
    storage: 1Gi
  hostPath:
    path: /data/mysql-data
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Retain
  storageClassName: standard
  volumeMode: Filesystem

---

##### FILE: myql_efimero.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-secret
        image: mysql:latest
        name: mysql-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306

---

  - list

kind: RoleBinding
metadata:
  name: auditor-rb
  namespace: default

  apiGroup: rbac.authorization.k8s.io
  kind: Role
  name: auditor-role

  name: auditor

##### FILE: my-react-app-depl.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/my-react-app-depl:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: my-react-app-depl
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: react-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: react-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: thilanka998/my-react-app:latest
        name: react-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi

---

kind: Service

  name: my-react-app-srv
  namespace: default

  ports:
  - name: my-app
    port: 80
    targetPort: 3000
  selector:
    app: react-app
  type: NodePort

##### FILE: my-readiness-probe.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/myapp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    type: webapp
  name: myapp
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      type: webapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        type: webapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 3
          timeoutSeconds: 4

---

  name: nginx-rs
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3

    matchLabels:

      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: mynginx

##### FILE: my-scheduler.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Pod/mike-scheduler:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    component: mike-scheduler
    tier: control-plane
  name: mike-scheduler
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - kube-scheduler
    - --authentication-kubeconfig=/etc/kubernetes/scheduler.conf
    - --authorization-kubeconfig=/etc/kubernetes/scheduler.conf
    - --secure-port=10269
    - --bind-address=0.0.0.0
    - --kubeconfig=/etc/kubernetes/scheduler.conf
    - --leader-elect=false
    image: registry.k8s.io/kube-scheduler:v1.28.10
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    livenessProbe:
      failureThreshold: 8
      httpGet:
        host: 127.0.0.1
        path: /healthz
        port: 10269
        scheme: HTTPS
      initialDelaySeconds: 10
      periodSeconds: 10
      timeoutSeconds: 15
    name: mike-scheduler
    resources:
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
    startupProbe:
      failureThreshold: 24
      httpGet:
        host: 127.0.0.1
        path: /healthz
        port: 10269
        scheme: HTTPS
      initialDelaySeconds: 10
      periodSeconds: 10
      timeoutSeconds: 15
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /etc/kubernetes/scheduler.conf
      name: kubeconfig
      readOnly: true
  hostNetwork: true
  priority: 2000001000
  priorityClassName: system-node-critical
  schedulerName: mike-scheduler
  securityContext:
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /etc/kubernetes/scheduler.conf
      type: FileOrCreate
    name: kubeconfig
status: {}

---

apiVersion: apps/v1

      tier: control-plane

        tier: control-plane
        version: second

        - /usr/local/bin/kube-scheduler
        - --config=/etc/kubernetes/my-scheduler/my-scheduler-config.yaml
        image: DOCKER_HUB_USER_ID/my-kube-scheduler:1.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10251
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
        name: kube-second-scheduler
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10251
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: "0.1"
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/kubernetes/my-scheduler
          name: config-volume
      hostNetwork: false
      hostPID: false
      serviceAccountName: my-scheduler
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: my-scheduler-config
        name: config-volume

  containers:
  - env:
    - name: SECRET_USERNAME
      valueFrom:
        secretKeyRef:
          key: username
          name: mysecret
    - name: SECRET_PASSWORD
      valueFrom:

          key: password
          name: mysecret

    name: mycontainer

##### FILE: mysqk-server.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/postgresql-statefulset:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: postgresql-statefulset
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: postgresql
  serviceName: postgresql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: postgresql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          value: mydatabase
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: postgres
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          value: mysecretpassword
        image: postgres:latest
        name: postgresql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: postgresql-persistent-storage
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: postgresql-persistent-storage
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

---

##### FILE: mysql copy_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-root-password
              name: mysql-secret
        image: mysql:5.6
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

---

##### FILE: mysql-all_4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/todo-mysql-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
  name: todo-mysql-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: todo-mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: todo-mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --character-set-server=utf8mb4
        - --collation-server=utf8mb4_unicode_ci
        env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database
              name: mysql-config
        - name: LANG
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: lang
              name: mysql-config
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: todo-mysql-pod
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pvc

---

##### FILE: mysql-app_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mysql-set:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mysql-set
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  serviceName: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: mysql-password
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-store
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mysql-store
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 2Gi
      storageClassName: group-sc

---

##### FILE: mysql-backup.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/CronJob/mysql-cronjob:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: mysql-cronjob
  namespace: default
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - env:
            - name: MYSQL_ENV_DB_HOST
              valueFrom:
                configMapKeyRef:
                  key: DB_HOST
                  name: dados
            - name: MYSQL_ENV_DB_USER
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  key: DB_USER
                  name: senhas
            - name: MYSQL_ENV_DB_PASSWORD
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  key: DB_PASSWORD
                  name: senhas
            image: leonardosartorello/mysqldump:v4
            name: mysql-backup
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
  schedule: 0 3 * * *

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mysql-catalog-deployment
  namespace: library-ns
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql-catalog
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql-catalog
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: password
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: catalog-library
        image: mysql:8.0.27
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306

##### FILE: mysql-catalog1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql-catalog-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mysql-catalog-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql-catalog
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql-catalog
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: password
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: catalog-library
        image: mysql:8.0.27
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: mysql-initdb
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mysql-catalog-initdb-config
        name: mysql-initdb

---

##### FILE: mysql-catalog1_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/mysql-catalog-initdb-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  initdb.sql: "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS `catalog-library`;\nUSE `catalog-library`;\nCREATE
    TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Book (\n  titulo VARCHAR(60), \n  ISBN VARCHAR(60) PRIMARY
    KEY, \n  autor VARCHAR(60), \n  descripcion VARCHAR(250),\n  valor VARCHAR(60),\n
    \ unidades INT\n);\nDELIMITER //\nCREATE PROCEDURE GetAllBooks()\nBEGIN\n  SELECT
    * FROM Book;\nEND //\n\nCREATE PROCEDURE AddOrUpdateBook(titulo VARCHAR(60), \n
    \ isbn VARCHAR(60), \n  autor VARCHAR(60),\n  descripcion VARCHAR(250),\n  valor
    VARCHAR(60),\n  unidades INT)\nBEGIN\n  if(ISNULL((SELECT b.ISBN FROM Book b WHERE
    b.ISBN = isbn))) then \n    INSERT INTO Book VALUES (titulo, isbn, autor, descripcion,
    valor, unidades);\n  ELSE\n    UPDATE Book b SET titulo=titulo, autor=autor, descripcion=descripcion,
    \n      valor=valor, unidades=unidades WHERE b.ISBN = isbn;\n  END if;\nEND //\n\nCREATE
    PROCEDURE DeleteBook(isbn VARCHAR(60))\nBEGIN\n  DELETE FROM Book b WHERE b.ISBN
    = isbn;\nEND //\n\n# Insercin de los datos\nDELIMITER ;\nINSERT INTO Book VALUES
    (\"El milagro metabolico\", \"9789584276971\", \"Carlos Jaramillo\", \"En este
    libro, el clebre doctor Carlos Jaramillo ofrece respuestas contundentes a esas
    preguntas y plantea que la clave para un peso ptimo y una salud plena est en
    el metabolismo\", \"49\", 10);\nINSERT INTO Book VALUES (\"A fuego lento\", \"9789584295446\",
    \"Paula Hawkins\", \"El descubrimiento del cuerpo de un joven asesinado brutalmente
    en una casa flotante de Londres desencadena sospechas sobre tres mujeres. \",
    \"59\", 20);\nINSERT INTO Book VALUES (\"Silence\", \"9789585191426\", \"Flor
    M. Salvador\", \"La confusin se ha disipado y ya no hay nada que perturbe la
    relacin entre Patch y Nora\", \"55\", 15);\nINSERT INTO Book VALUES (\"inquebrantables\",
    \"9789585190300\", \"Daniel Habif\", \"Proporciona inspiracion y motivacion para
    ayudar allector a superar obstaculos y crear la vida que desea vivir\", \"39\",
    18);\nINSERT INTO Book VALUES (\"La bailarina de Auschwitz\", \"9789585191066\",
    \"Edith Egerr\", \"inspiradora historia de supervivencia\", \"40\", 15);\nINSERT
    INTO Book VALUES (\"Los fantasmas de canterville y otras historias\", \"9789585190366\",
    \"Oscar wilde\", \"Presenta 3 pequeas historias que relatan la aventura de los
    protagonistas\", \"20\", 15);\nINSERT INTO Book VALUES (\"Los cuatro acuerdos\",
    \"9789585190603\", \"Don Miguel Ruiz\", \"una guia practica para la libertad personal\",
    \"55\", 15);\nINSERT INTO Book VALUES (\"El super zorro\", \"9789585190001\",
    \"Roald dahl\", \"novela para nios, que cuenta la aventura de un zorro y familia
    mientras son perseguidos por tres hermanos\", \"12\", 14);\nINSERT INTO Book VALUES
    (\"El arte de la programacion- introduccion a la informtica.\", \"10010090321\",
    \"Leonel Parra\", \"Introduccion a la informatica mediante la progamacion en C++\",
    \"15\", 50);\nINSERT INTO Book VALUES (\"Cien aos de soledad\", \"132414019321\",
    \"Gabriel Garcia Mrquez\", \"El libro narra la historia de la familia Buenda
    a lo largo de siete generaciones en el pueblo ficticio de Macondo\", \"20\", 5);\nINSERT
    INTO Book VALUES (\"Se tu propio jefe en 12 meses\", \"03213128888\", \"Melinda
    Emerson\", \"Cuntas veces has soado con abrir tu empresa y ser tu propio jefe?
    \", \"0.5\", 900);\nINSERT INTO Book VALUES (\"The Ultimate Beginners Guide to
    Learn Docker Step-By-Step\", \"0321299999\", \"Mark Reed\", \"Libro para aprender
    docker\", \"8\", 12);\nINSERT INTO Book VALUES (\"Le Petit Prince\", \"123132131321\",
    \"Antoine de Saint-Exupery\", \"El principito es un cuento potico que viene acompaado
    de ilustraciones hechas con acuarelas por el mismo Saint-Exupry.\", \"20\", 50);"
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: mysql-catalog-initdb-config
  namespace: default

    USE ecomdb;
    CREATE TABLE products (
        id mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment,
        Name varchar(255) default NULL,
        Price varchar(255) default NULL,
        ImageUrl varchar(255) default NULL,
        PRIMARY KEY (id)
    ) AUTO_INCREMENT=1;

    INSERT INTO products (Name,Price,ImageUrl)
    VALUES
        ("Laptop","100","c-1.png"),
        ("Drone","200","c-2.png"),
        ("VR","300","c-3.png"),

        ("Watch","90","c-6.png"),
        ("Phone Covers","20","c-7.png"),

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/mysql-cnf:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  utf8.cnf: |
    [client]
    default-character-set = utf8

    [mysqld]
    init_connect = SET collation_connection = utf8_general_ci
    init_connect = SET NAMES utf8
    character-set-server = utf8
    collation-server = utf8_general_ci
    skip-character-set-client-handshake


    [mysqldump]
    default-character-set = utf8

    [mysql]
    default-character-set = utf8
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: mysql-cnf
  namespace: default

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to galera/ConfigMap/mysql-config-vol:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  galera.cnf: |
    [galera]
    user = mysql
    bind-address = 0.0.0.0
    # Optimizations
    innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit = 0
    sync_binlog = 0
    expire_logs_days = 7
    # Required settings
    default_storage_engine = InnoDB
    binlog_format = ROW
    innodb_autoinc_lock_mode = 2
    query_cache_size = 0
    query_cache_type = 0
    # MariaDB Galera settings
    #wsrep_debug=ON
    wsrep_on=ON
    wsrep_provider=/usr/lib/galera/libgalera_smm.so
    wsrep_sst_method=rsync
    # Cluster settings (automatically updated)
    wsrep_cluster_address=gcomm://
    wsrep_cluster_name=galera
    wsrep_node_address=127.0.0.1
  mariadb.cnf: |
    [client]
    default-character-set = utf8
    [mysqld]
    character-set-server  = utf8
    collation-server      = utf8_general_ci
    # InnoDB optimizations
    innodb_log_file_size  = 64M
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
  name: mysql-config-vol
  namespace: galera

policy add-networkpolicy applied to default/Namespace/mysql:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: mysql
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/mysql:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: mysql
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/mysql:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: mysql
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/mysql:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: mysql
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

##### FILE: mysql-config4_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to mysql/ConfigMap/mysql-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  my.cnf: |-
    [mysqld]
    innodb_buffer_pool_size=1G
    innodb_log_buffer_size = 64M
    innodb_file_per_table = 1
    innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit = 1
    innodb_log_file_size = 256M
    innodb_force_recovery = 1
    log_bin = /var/lib/mysql/mysql-bin
    expire_logs_days = 10  # Apaga logs binrios antigos aps 10 dias
    sync_binlog = 1
    table_open_cache = 2048  # Aumenta a capacidade de tabelas abertas simultaneamente
    table_definition_cache = 1024
    key_buffer_size = 256M  # Para MyISAM, aumenta o cache de ndices
    slow_query_log = 1
    slow_query_log_file = /var/lib/mysql/mysql-slow.log
    long_query_time = 2  # Registra consultas que demoram mais de 2 segundos
    max_connections = 500
    read_buffer_size = 1048576
    net_read_timeout = 360
    net_write_timeout = 360
    tmp_table_size = 128M  # Tamanho mximo de tabelas temporrias em memria
    max_heap_table_size = 128M
  nfs-path: /storage/hd5/DB
  root-password: password
  server-ip: 10.1.1.6
  storage: 10Gi
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: mysql-config
  namespace: mysql

---

##### FILE: mysql-config-map.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to development/ConfigMap/mysql-preload-data-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  init.sql: |
    CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS`sportsstore`;
    USE `sportsstore`;
    DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `product`;
    CREATE TABLE `product` (
      `price` int DEFAULT NULL,
      `product_id` bigint NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
      `category` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
      `description` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
      `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
      PRIMARY KEY (`product_id`)
    ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=12 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;
    LOCK TABLES `product` WRITE;
    INSERT INTO `product` VALUES (49,2,'Watersports','Protective and fashionable','Lifejacket'),(20,3,'Soccer','FIFA-approved size and weight','Soccer Ball'),(35,4,'Soccer','Give your playing field a professional touch','Corner Flags'),(79500,5,'Soccer','Flat-packed 35,000-seat stadium','Stadium'),(16,6,'Chess','Improve brain efficiency by 75%!'(MISSING),'Thinking Cap'),(30,7,'Chess','Secretly give your opponent a disadvantage','Unsteady Chair'),(75,8,'Chess','A fun game for the family','Human Chess Board'),(1200,9,'Chess','Gold-plated, diamond-studded King','Bling King'),(10,11,'Living Room','Red Sofa','Sofa');
    UNLOCK TABLES;
    DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `orders`;
    CREATE TABLE `orders` (
      `shipped` bit(1) DEFAULT NULL,
      `order_id` bigint NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
      `address` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
      `city` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
      `country` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
      `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
      `state` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
      `zip` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
      `cart_id` bigint DEFAULT NULL,
      PRIMARY KEY (`order_id`),
      KEY `orders_cart_FK` (`cart_id`),
      CONSTRAINT `orders_cart_FK` FOREIGN KEY (`cart_id`) REFERENCES `cart` (`cart_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
    ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=44 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;
    LOCK TABLES `orders` WRITE;
    UNLOCK TABLES;
    DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `cart`;
    CREATE TABLE `cart` (
      `cart_price` bigint DEFAULT NULL,
      `cart_id` bigint NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
      `item_count` int DEFAULT NULL,
      PRIMARY KEY (`cart_id`)
    ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=31 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;
    LOCK TABLES `cart` WRITE;
    INSERT INTO `cart` VALUES (1550,27,2),(1550,28,2),(40,29,2),(35,30,1);
    UNLOCK TABLES;
    DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `cartline`;
    CREATE TABLE `cartline` (
      `cart_line_id` bigint NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
      `quantity` int DEFAULT NULL,
      `product_id` bigint DEFAULT NULL,
      `cart_id` bigint DEFAULT NULL,
      PRIMARY KEY (`cart_line_id`),
      KEY `CartLine_product_FK` (`product_id`),
      KEY `cartline_cart_FK` (`cart_id`),
      CONSTRAINT `cartline_cart_FK` FOREIGN KEY (`cart_id`) REFERENCES `cart` (`cart_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE,
      CONSTRAINT `CartLine_product_FK` FOREIGN KEY (`product_id`) REFERENCES `product` (`product_id`)
    ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=28 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;
    INSERT INTO `cartline` VALUES (23,3,2,27),(24,7,7,27),(25,3,2,28),(26,7,7,28),(27,1,4,30);
    UNLOCK TABLES;
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql-gke-deployment
    name: mysql-data-storea
  name: mysql-preload-data-config
  namespace: development

---

     `id`int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
     `title`varchar(255) NOT NULL,

  primary.cnf: "# Apply this config only on the primary.\n[mysqld]\nlog-bin    \n"
  replica.cnf: "# Apply this config only on replicas.\n[mysqld]\nsuper-read-only \n"
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
    app.kubernetes.io/name: mysql
  name: mysql
  namespace: default

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/init-script-configmap:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  init-script.sql: |
    GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON *.* TO 'root'@'%!'(MISSING);
    CREATE USER 'slt_user'@'%!'(MISSING);
    CREATE USER 'dml_user'@'%!'(MISSING) identified by 'password';
    GRANT SELECT ON *.* TO 'slt_user'@'%!'(MISSING);
    GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON *.* TO 'dml_user'@'%!'(MISSING);
    CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS `database1`;
    CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS `database2`;
    FLUSH PRIVILEGES;
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: init-script-configmap
  namespace: default

##### FILE: mysql-config-subpath_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: password
        image: mysql:5.6
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/mysql/conf.d/binlog_format.cnf
          name: mysql-configmap-volume
          subPath: binlog_format.cnf
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: mysql_binlog_format.cnf
            path: binlog_format.cnf
          name: mysql-configmap
        name: mysql-configmap-volume

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/mysql

1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/mysql failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/mysql failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Deployment/mysql failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Deployment/mysql failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

##### FILE: mysql-core_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql-core:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql-core
  name: mysql-core
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql-core
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql-core
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: example-password
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: chain_optimizer_schema
        image: mysql:8.0
        name: mysql-core
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: mysql-core-initdb
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mysql-core-initdb
        name: mysql-core-initdb

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/mysql-core

##### FILE: mysql-database_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mysql-statefulset:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
  name: mysql-statefulset
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  serviceName: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQLDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: secrets
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQLDB_DATABASE
              name: secrets
        image: mysql:8.2.0
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-vol
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mysql-vol
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 5Gi

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

    app: flaskappdb
  name: mysql-database
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flaskappdb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: flaskappdb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-root-password
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_HOST
          value: localhost
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: crud
        image: 654654204927.dkr.ecr.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com/mysqldb
        name: flaskappdb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306

##### FILE: mysql-database-pvc.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql-database:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: flaskappdb
  name: mysql-database
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flaskappdb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: flaskappdb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-root-password
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: crud
        image: 654654204927.dkr.ecr.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com/mysqlpod:latest
        name: flaskappdb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pvc

---

##### FILE: mysql-db_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to exam/StatefulSet/mysql-statefulset:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mysql-statefulset
  namespace: exam
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  serviceName: mysql-service
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-secret
        image: mysql:8.2.0
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: db-port
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 256Mi
        startupProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - cd
            - /var/lib/mysql/projectdb
          failureThreshold: 5
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-data
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mysql-data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

---

##### FILE: mysql-db-init-job.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/mysql-db-init-job:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: mysql-db-init-job
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - mysql -h mysql -uroot -p$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD recruit -e 'source /init-db/init-db.sql'
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: mysql-secret
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: mysql-init
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /init-db
          name: init-db-script
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mysql-init-db-script
        name: init-db-script

---

##### FILE: mysql-dep.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql-dep:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql-dep
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: mysql
      name: mysql-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ALLOW_EMPTY_PASSWORD
          value: "true"
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: mysql-initdb
        - mountPath: /etc/mysql/my.cnf
          name: mysql-cnf
          subPath: my.cnf
        - mountPath: /usr/log/
          name: mysql-log
      - args:
        - -c
        - tail -f /usr/log/general.log;
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        image: busybox
        name: logreader
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/log/
          name: mysql-log
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mysql-initdb-cm
        name: mysql-initdb
      - configMap:
          name: mysql-cnf-cm
        name: mysql-cnf
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: mysql-log

---

##### FILE: mysql-depl.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to banking/Deployment/mysql-customer-db:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql-customer-db
  name: mysql-customer-db
  namespace: banking
spec:
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 600
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: customer-mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: customer-mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysqlDbUserName
              name: customer-secret
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysqlDbPassword
              name: customer-secret
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysqlDbRootPassword
              name: customer-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mysqlDbName
              name: customer-configmap
        image: mysql:latest
        name: customer-mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0.5
            memory: 512Mi

---

##### FILE: mysql-depl1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to banking/Deployment/mysql-customer-db:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql-customer-db
  name: mysql-customer-db
  namespace: banking
spec:
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 600
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: customer-mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: customer-mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysqlDbUserName
              name: customer-secret
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysqlDbPassword
              name: customer-secret
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysqlDbRootPassword
              name: customer-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mysqlDbName
              name: customer-configmap
        image: mysql:latest
        name: customer-mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0.5
            memory: 512Mi

---

##### FILE: mysql-deploy.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-secret
        image: mysql:5.6
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-volume
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pvc

---

##### FILE: mysql-deploy12.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: phonebook-app
    name: mysql-deploy
  name: mysql-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: phonebook-app
      name: mysql-pod
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: phonebook-app
        name: mysql-pod
      name: mysql-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-password
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-root-password
              name: mysql-secret
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: database-configmap
        image: mysql:5.7
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

---

##### FILE: mysql-deploy17.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to 2tier-ns/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
  name: mysql
  namespace: 2tier-ns
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-pwd
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: fcdb
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: fcuser
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_HOST
          value: '%!'(MISSING)
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          value: Passw0rD
        image: mysql:5.6
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pvc

---

##### FILE: mysql-deploy19.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: root-password
              name: mysql
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: user
              name: mysql
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database
              name: mysql
        image: mysql:latest
        name: mysql

---

##### FILE: mysql-deploy24.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: dbpass
              name: my-secret
        image: mysql:5.6
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /bin/sh
            - -c
            - nc -z localhost 8095
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: usermanagement-dbcreation-script
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - echo -e "Checking for the availability of MySQL Server deployment"; while
          ! nc -z mysql 3306; do sleep 1; printf "-"; done; echo -e "  >> MySQL DB
          Server has started";
        image: busybox:1.31
        name: init-sql
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: ebs-mysql-pvc
      - configMap:
          name: usermgmt-dbcreation-script
        name: usermanagement-dbcreation-script

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/mysql

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/mysql
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/mysql failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/mysql failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/mysql failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Deployment/mysql failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/initContainers/0/resources/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    maintainer: Robert
    state: In progress
  labels:
    app: websql
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: websql
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: websql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: mysecret
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: mysqlcont
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: timezonehost
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
        name: timezonehost

##### FILE: mysql-deploy29.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to web-app/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: web-app
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database-name
              name: mysql-config
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database-user
              name: mysql-config
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database-password
              name: mysql-config
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database-root-password
              name: mysql-config
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: nfs-pvc

---
