apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolume
metadata:
  name: mysql-nfs-pv
  namespace: default
spec:
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteMany
  capacity:
    storage: 10Gi
  mountOptions:
  - hard
  - nfsvers=4.1
  nfs:
    path: /nfs-share/kubernetes/mysql
    server: 192.168.0.96
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Recycle
  storageClassName: mysql-nfs-sc
  volumeMode: Filesystem

  namespace: default

  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-secret

        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql

          name: mysql-nfs-volume

      - name: mysql-nfs-volume

          claimName: mysql-nfs-pvc

        app: mysql-deploy
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: mysql-secret
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        resources: {}

        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-pv-storage

##### FILE: mysql-deploy4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to olv/Deployment/mysql-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    deploy: mysql-deploy
  name: mysql-deploy
  namespace: olv
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      pod: mysql-pod
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        pod: mysql-pod
      namespace: olv
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: mysql-secret
        image: olv04:5000/mysql:8.0.33
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: mysql-container
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 256Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-vol-node
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /mnt/mysql-server
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: mysql-vol-node

---

  namespace: default

        app: mysql

        - secretRef:

##### FILE: mysql-deploy8.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
  name: mysql-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-root-password
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-password
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-user
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mysql-database
              name: mysql-configmap
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-pv
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-pv
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

---

data:
  initdb.sql: |
    USE appdb;
    DROP TABLE IF EXISTS clients;
    CREATE TABLE clients (
        id varchar(255) NOT NULL,
        name varchar(255) NOT NULL,
        age int(20) NOT NULL,
        country varchar(255) NOT NULL,
        PRIMARY KEY (id)
    );

##### FILE: mysql-deployment10_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to crd-op-writer/Deployment/crd-op-app-mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: crd-op-app
  name: crd-op-app-mysql
  namespace: crd-op-writer
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: crd-op-app
      tier: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: crd-op-app
        tier: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-pass
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: appdb
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: appuser
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-pass
        image: mysql:8.0.32
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: mysql-initdb
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim
      - configMap:
          name: mysql-initdb-config
        name: mysql-initdb

---

##### FILE: mysql-deployment100.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: mysql
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        io.kompose.service: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_DATABASE
              name: todo-web-application-config
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_PASSWORD
              name: todo-web-application-secrets
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: todo-web-application-secrets
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_USER
              name: todo-web-application-config
        image: mysql:latest
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          hostPort: 3306
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-database-data-volume
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-database-data-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-database-data-volume

---

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/wordpress-mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: wordpress
  name: wordpress-mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: wordpress
      tier: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: wordpress
        tier: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --default-authentication-plugin=mysql_native_password
        env:
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: wordpress
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-pass
        image: mysql:8.0.20
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: password
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: mydatabase
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: init-db-script-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: init-db-script
        name: init-db-script-volume

##### FILE: mysql-deployment110_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/wordpress-mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: wordpress
  name: wordpress-mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: wordpress
      tier: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: wordpress
        tier: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-pass
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: wordpress
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: wordpress
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-pass
        image: mysql:8.0
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

---

##### FILE: mysql-deployment117.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: app-configmap
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_DATABASE
              name: app-configmap
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_USER
              name: app-configmap
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_PASSWORD
              name: app-configmap
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: configmap-pvc-claim

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: app-secrets
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_DATABASE
              name: app-secrets
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_USER
              name: app-secrets
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_PASSWORD
              name: app-secrets
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: configmap-pvc-claim

##### FILE: mysql-deployment12.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: password
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: mydatabase
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: init-db-script-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: init-db-script
        name: init-db-script-volume

---

    app: wordpress

          name: mysql-persistent-storage

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: root
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: project_database
        image: 705689285387.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/mysql:5.7
        name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-data
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: mysql-data

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-root-password
              name: mysql-secret
        image: mysql:5.6
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pvc

---

          value: wordpress

##### FILE: mysql-deployment129.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to project-apani-node/Deployment/mysql-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql-deployment
  namespace: project-apani-node
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql_database
              name: secret
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql_user
              name: secret
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql_password
              name: secret
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql_root_password
              name: secret
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: mysqlapp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 256m
            memory: 512Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-mounted-volume
      nodeSelector:
        node: agent-node
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pvc

---

##### FILE: mysql-deployment131_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/wordpress-mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: wordpress
  name: wordpress-mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: wordpress
      tier: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: wordpress
        tier: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-pass
        image: mysql:5.6
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3306
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

---

##### FILE: mysql-deployment132.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/todo-mysql-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
  name: todo-mysql-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: todo-mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: todo-mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --character-set-server=utf8mb4
        - --collation-server=utf8mb4_unicode_ci
        env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database
              name: mysql-config
        - name: LANG
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: lang
              name: mysql-config
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: todo-mysql-pod
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pvc

---

##### FILE: mysql-deployment134_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
    tier: database
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
      tier: database
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
        tier: database
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-secrets
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: dbName
              name: db-config
        image: mysql:8.3.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

---

##### FILE: mysql-deployment135_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  serviceName: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: root
        image: mysql:8.0
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: mysql-initdb
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mysql-initdb-cm
        name: mysql-initdb
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pvc

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/sqldb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: webapp-sql
    tier: backend
  name: sqldb
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: webapp-sql
      tier: backend
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: webapp-sql
        tier: backend
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --default-authentication-plugin=mysql_native_password
        env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: password
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: chat
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: db_user
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          value: password
        image: mysql
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    app: mysql
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: restadmin
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          value: password
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: restdb
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: password
        image: mysql:8
        name: mysql
        resources: {}
status: {}

##### FILE: mysql-deployment140.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: rootpassword
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: wordpress
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: wordpress
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          value: password
        image: mysql:8.0
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-data
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: mysql-data

---

##### FILE: mysql-deployment144.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mysql-statefulset:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mysql-statefulset
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  serviceName: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - web
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_DATABASE
              name: mysql-configmap
        image: mysql:latest
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mysql-persistent-storage
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 10Gi

---

  name: mysql-statefulset

    matchLabels:

  serviceName: mysql
  template:
    metadata:

            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_DATABASE
              name: mysql-configmap

        name: mysql

        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:

      name: mysql-persistent-storage
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce

##### FILE: mysql-deployment146.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to mysql/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: mysql
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: my_database
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: my_user
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          value: my_password
        image: mysql:latest
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-storage
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: mysql-table
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim
      - configMap:
          name: mysql-ctable
        name: mysql-table

##### FILE: mysql-deployment147.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: root
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: springdrugs
        image: mysql:8.0
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mysqladmin
            - ping
            - -h
            - localhost
            - -uroot
            - -proot
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306

##### FILE: mysql-deployment15_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/wordpress-mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: wordpress
  name: wordpress-mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: wordpress
      tier: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: wordpress
        tier: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-pass
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: wordpress
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: wordpress
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-pass
        image: mysql:8.0
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

---

  serviceName: mysql

##### FILE: mysql-deployment21_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/wordpress-mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: wordpress
  name: wordpress-mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: wordpress
      tier: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: wordpress
        tier: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-pass
        image: mysql:5.6
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3306
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

---

  name: wordpress-mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: wordpress
      tier: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: wordpress
        tier: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-pass
        image: mysql:5.6
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3306
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/wordpress-mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: wordpress-mysql
  name: wordpress-mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: wordpress-mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: wordpress-mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-pass
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: wordpress
        image: mysql:5.7
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 900m
            memory: 512Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-pvc
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-pvc
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pvc

##### FILE: mysql-deployment30.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to wso2is/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: wso2is
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
      deployment: mysql
      pod: wso2is
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
        deployment: mysql
        pod: wso2is
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: root
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: regadmin
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          value: regadmin
        image: mysql:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        securityContext:
          runAsUser: 999
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: mysql-dbscripts
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mysql-dbscripts
        name: mysql-dbscripts

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  serviceName: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: root
        image: mysql:8.0
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: mysql-initdb
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mysql-persistent-storage
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi
      storageClassName: manual

##### FILE: mysql-deployment34_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/wordpress-mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: wordpress
  name: wordpress-mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: wordpress
      tier: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: wordpress
        tier: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-pass
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: wordpress
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: wordpress
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-pass
        image: mysql:8.0
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1000Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 500Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          runAsGroup: 999
          runAsUser: 999
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /bin/chown
        - -R
        - 999:999
        - /var/lib/mysql
        image: busybox:latest
        name: chmod-er
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

---

          name: mysql

##### FILE: mysql-deployment41.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_DB
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DB
              name: mysql-secret-config
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: USER
              name: mysql-secret-config
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: PASSWORD
              name: mysql-secret-config
        image: kubbak/mysql:easyhr
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysqlsql/data
          name: mysql-pv-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-pv-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

---

##### FILE: mysql-deployment43.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: your_password
        image: mysql:5.6
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

##### FILE: mysql-deployment45.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
  name: mysql-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database
              name: mysql-config
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pvc

---

kind: Deployment

  name: mysql-deployment
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1

  template:

        app: mysql

          value: city_database
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: aymen
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          value: aymen

        name: mysql-container

        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: mysql-init-script
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mysql-init-script
        name: mysql-init-script

##### FILE: mysql-deployment50.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/wordpress-mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: wordpress
  name: wordpress-mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: wordpress
      tier: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: wordpress
        tier: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-pass
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: wordpress
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: wordpress
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-pass
        image: mysql:latest
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

---

##### FILE: mysql-deployment51.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-root-pass
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database
              name: mysql-db-url
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mysql-user-pass
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-user-pass
        image: mysql:8.0
        name: mysql-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 33060
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

---

##### FILE: mysql-deployment58.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
  name: mysql-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_USER
              name: my-secret
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_PASSWORD
              name: my-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_DATABASE
              name: my-config-map
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-data
          subPath: mysql
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: mysql-initdb
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pvc
      - configMap:
          name: my-config-map
        name: mysql-initdb

---

    app: mysql
    app.kubernetes.io/component: backend
    app.kubernetes.io/name: mysql
  name: mysql-deployment
  namespace: default

  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
        app.kubernetes.io/component: backend
        app.kubernetes.io/name: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: mysql-root-password
        - name: MYSQL_HOST
          value: localhost
        - name: MYSQL_PORT
          value: "3306"
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: employees
        image: 181380864910.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/clo835-assignment1-ecr:mysql-20240203220702
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi

##### FILE: mysql-deployment64.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mssql-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mssql-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mssql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mssql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MSSQL_PID
          value: Developer
        - name: ACCEPT_EULA
          value: true
        - name: MSSQL_SA_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MSSQL_SA_PASSWORD
              name: mssql
        image: mcr.microsoft.com/mssql/server:2022-latest
        name: mssql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 1433
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 1G
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 1G
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/opt/mssql
          name: mssqldb
      hostname: mssqlinst
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 10001
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - name: mssqldb
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mssql-data

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql-deployment
  namespace: database-group
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: pass123
        image: mysql
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306

  resources:

##### FILE: mysql-deployment-service-with-pvc.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-root-password
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-password
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-database
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-username
              name: mysql-secret
        image: mysql:latest
        name: sql-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/mysql-deployment

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/mysql-deployment
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/mysql-deployment failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Deployment/mysql-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/mysql-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/mysql-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Deployment/mysql-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Deployment/mysql-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Deployment/mysql-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Deployment/mysql-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource default/Deployment/mysql-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/

##### FILE: mysql-deployment-with-localhost-mount-to-container.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-root-password
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-password
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-database
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-username
              name: mysql-secret
        image: mysql:latest
        name: sql-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-local-directory-volume
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /home/apmec/kubernetes-volumes
        name: mysql-local-directory-volume

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: my-startup-probe.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/myapp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    type: webapp
  name: myapp
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      type: webapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        type: webapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 3
          timeoutSeconds: 4

---

##### FILE: my-stats-script-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/my-stats-script:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: my-stats-script
  name: my-stats-script
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: my-stats-script
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        io.kompose.service: my-stats-script
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - sh
        - -c
        - python stats-app.py
        env:
        - name: KAFKA_BOOTSTRAP_SERVERS
          value: kafka_bootstrap_servers_value
        - name: KAFKA_TOPIC
          value: kafka_topic_value
        - name: MONGO_ICMP_URI
          value: mongo_icmp_uri_value
        - name: MONGO_TCP_URI
          value: mongo_tcp_uri_value
        - name: MONGO_UDP_URI
          value: mongo_udp_uri_value
        - name: MONGO_UNKNOWN_URI
          value: mongo_unknown_uri_value
        image: ayoubtest1/statsapp:latest
        name: my-stats-script
        resources: {}
      restartPolicy: Always
status: {}

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: webapp
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 20
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: webapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: webapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: app
        operator: Equal
        value: root

##### FILE: my-web.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/webapp-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: webapp
  name: webapp-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: webapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: webapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo_user
              name: secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo_ password
              name: secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mongo-url
              name: mongo-config
        image: mongo-express:latest
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

---
